definition: to make up (one's face)/to dress/(of one's dress) beautiful

sentences.english: Other than people, things can also "catch one's eye."
sentences.chinese: 除了靓女帅哥外，其他事物也可以吸引你的注意力。

sentences.english: What do you like the handsome boy and pretty girl?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢什么样的帅哥和靓女呢？

sentences.english: Eric says frankly that pretty girls cannot attract him.
sentences.chinese: 孙耀威坦言靓女不能吸引他。

sentences.english: Pretty girl, how much is the dress?
I only know a lot of handsome young and beautiful women in it.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道里面肯定有很多俊男靓女。

sentences.english: The way that BeautifulPeople. com accepts new members is simple.
sentences.chinese: 俊男靓女网站挑选新成员的方法是简单的。

sentences.english: The two beauties sat on the boat and watched Eric performing wake-boarding.
sentences.chinese: 两个靓女坐在船上看孙耀威表演花式滑水。

sentences.english: They work in Miami, where hot girls and hot guys fill the streets.
sentences.chinese: 他们的地点在迈阿密，满街都是靓仔靓女，波涛汹涌。

definition: old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
(slang) to pick up girls/to chase after girls
